alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:32AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown and south central Horry Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1032 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Murrells Inlet. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Springmaid Pier, Socastee, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Red Hill, Burgess, Bucksville, Bucksport, Plantersville, Yauhannah, Litchfield Beach, Forestbrook and Waccamaw Community Hospital. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown
